items.title: Man shouting 'free Palestine' injures eight in Colorado
items.description: The FBI calls it a suspected terror attack and says the suspect used a makeshift flamethrower.

items.title: Al-Qaeda linked group says it carried out huge attack on Mali's army
items.description: The army says it defended its post "vigorously" but eventually withdrew, as militants seized on their base.

items.title: Mount Etna erupts as large plumes rise from volcano
items.description: The full scale of the eruption is currently unclear and disruption appears to be minimal.

items.title: More than 700 believed dead in devastating Nigeria floods
items.description: About 500 people are still missing in the town of Mokwa, and officials fear no more survivors will be found.

items.title: 'I watched helplessly as water washed my family away' in Nigeria floods
items.description: Residents of a Nigeria town tell the BBC they are homeless and penniless after devastating floods.
